name: HON Modification Manager File
summary: Learn about .HONMOD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HONMOD files do not include actual modification data for the game. They only specify the requirements for applying the mod. The XML specification file is named mod.xml. It includes title and version information, mod dependencies, mod incompatibilities, and instructions for copying and editing mod files.

description: Game mod file created by HON Modification Manager, a program used to manage game alteration packages for Heroes of Newerth (HON); saved in a compressed .ZIP format and contains an optional 48x48 pixel .PNG icon image for the mod as well as a required XML file that describes how the mod is applied.
